QuestData.Title: Fight the Power
QuestData.Description: It's time for the final push against the Jadefire!$B$BIf you're prepared to break through their foul barrier and bring the fight to their leader, I'd also ask your help against the lesser satyr. Our druids fight ferociously, but your strength can help turn the battle.$B$BShow the Jadefire that their power will no longer hold sway over these lands!
QuestData.LogDescription: Slay 8 Jadefire Rogues or Jadefire Shadowstalkers at the Ruins of Constellas.
QuestData.RewardText: A few of the remaining satyr have fled into the deeper woods, but they have taken heavy losses. Good job, $n.
